title: Looking for some Help with my stream
body:
Im starting to stream, and I would love you long time if you would come pop in and let me know if i sound okay, if things are running smoothly and any other advice you have. Dont be afraid to say hi!

https://www.twitch.tv/kingspadeix

replies.body: okay switched to OBS hopefully that helps with the quality and buffering. let me know!
